message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,000?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your offer, but I can't go lower than $11,000.  I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I understand your position, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to consider a price of $9,500?
